English: Excuse me, I'll stay out here.

Finnish: Sä taisit olla tässä mua ennen.
English: I think you were here before me.
Excuse me, are you in line?
Are you taking me home or eating here?
Your friend's got a new job.
Your friend's loved one has died.

Finnish: (Sinun ystävä) kertoo, että hän on masentunut.
English: Your friend tells you they are depressed.

Finnish: (Sinun ystävä) kertoo, että hän on raskaana.
English: Your friend tells you she's pregnant.
Your friend has bought a new home.
